mapper.update: update auth_role set description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `role` = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{created_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, description, `name`, `role`, created_time, update_time from auth_role
